S0146.DECK.  146. SURVEY NUMBER
S0146.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S0146.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRAD?  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE OR CORPORAL 4. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE OR SERGEANT 5. TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE OR STAFF SERGEANT 6. TECHNICAL SERGEANT 7. MASTER SERGEANT OR FIRST SERGEANT 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  01. 18 YEARS OR LESS 02. 19 YEARS 03. 20 YEARS 04. 21 YEARS 05. 22 YEARS 06. 23 YEARS 07. 24 YEARS 08. 25 YEARS 09. 26 THRU 29 YEARS 10. 30 THRU 34 YEARS 11. 35 YEARS OR MORE 00. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q4. IN WHAT STATE OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM? E. SECTION:  1. NEW ENGLAND 2. MIDDLE ATLANTIC 3. EAST NORTH CENTRAL 4. WEST NORTH CENTRAL 5. SOUTH ATLANTIC 6. EAST SOUTH CENTRAL 7. WEST SOUTH CENTRAL 8. MOUNTAIN 9. PACIFIC 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q5. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM?  1. ON A FARM OR IN THE COUNTRY 2. IN A SMALL TOWN (FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE) 3. IN A TOWN (WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE) 4. IN A CITY (BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE) 5. IN A LARGE CITY (MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE) 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 6 AND 7 TO BE CODED TOGETHER.

S0146.Q6. ARE YOU SINGLE, MARRIED, DIVORCED OR SEPARATED OR WIDOWE? F. IF MARRIED:  Q.7. WERE YOU MARRIED BEFORE OR AFTER ENTERING THE ARM?  1. SINGLE 2. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 3. WIDOWED 4. MARRIED BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 5. MARRIED AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY 6. MARRIED, NO INDICATION WHEN 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q8. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAV?  1. I'M NOT MARRIED 2. HAVE NO CHILDREN 3. HAVE ONE CHILD 4. HAVE TWO CHILDREN 5. HAVE THREE OR MORE CHILDREN 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q9. HOW DID YOU COME INTO THE ARM?  1. I WAS DRAFTED 2. I VOLUNTEERED 3. I WAS IN THE NATIONAL GUARD 4. ERC - ROTC - RAR 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q10. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARM?  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 3. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 6. OVER 3 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q11. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE CHINA-BURMA-INDIA THEATE?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 18 MONTHS 6. OVER 18 MONTHS 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q12. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN STATIONED AT THIS PARTICULAR PLAC?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q13. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NO?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. FINANCE 09. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 10. AIR CORPS 11. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 12. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 13. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 14. MILITARY POLICE 15. D.E.M.L. 16. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 14 NOT CODED.

S0146.Q15. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRIT?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q16. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS A SOLDIER OR AS A WORKER IN A WAR JO?  1. AS A SOLDIER 2. AS A WAR WORKER 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 17 NOT CODED.

S0146.Q18. SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN AT THIS STATION HAVE YOU BEEN ABLE TO FIND INTERESTING THINGS TO DO ON YOUR OFF-DUTY FREE TIM?  1. I CAN USUALLY FIND INTERESTING THINGS TO DO 2. I CAN FIND INTERESTING THINGS TO DO ABOUT HALF OF THE TIME 3. I CAN VERY SELDOM FIND INTERESTING THINGS TO DO 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q19. HOW GOOD A JOB DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS DOING IN PROVIDING RECREATION AND ENTERTAINMENT FOR THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. A VERY GOOD JOB 2. A FAIRLY GOOD JOB 3. A PRETTY POOR JOB 4. A VERY POOR JOB 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q20. DO YOU THINK YOUR OFFICERS ARE DOING ALL THEY CAN TO SEE THAT THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT HAVE INTERESTING THINGS TO DO IN THEIR OFF-DUTY FREE TIM?  1. YES, THEY ARE DOING ALL THEY CAN 2. NO, THEY ARE NOT DOING ALL THEY CAN 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 21 NOT CODED.

S0146.Q22. SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE CHINA-BURMA-INDIA THEATER, HOW MANY TALKS BY OFFICERS HAVE YOU HEARD ABOUT VENEREAL DISEASE OR SEX PROBLEM?  1. NONE 2. ONE OR TWO TALKS 3. THREE OR FOUR TALKS 4. MORE THAN FOUR TALKS 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q23. SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE CHINA-BURMA-INDIA THEATER, HAVE YOU SEEN ANY FILMS ABOUT VENEREAL DISEASE OR SEX PROBLEM?  1. YES 2. NO 3. DON'T REMEMBER 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q24. HOW WOULD YOU RATE YOUR OWN GENERAL KNOWLEDGE ABOUT VENEREAL DISEASE?  1. I HAVE COMPLETE KNOWLEDGE OF THE SUBJECT 2. I HAVE A PRETTY FAIR KNOWLEDGE OF THE SUBJECT 3. I DON'T KNOW MUCH ABOUT THE SUBJECT 4. I DON'T KNOW ANYTHING AT ALL ABOUT THE SUBJECT 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q25. HOW IMPORTANT IS IT TO YOU PERSONALLY TO KNOW AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE ABOUT VENEREAL DISEASE?  1. IT IS VERY IMPORTANT TO ME 2. IT IS PRETTY IMPORTANT TO ME 3. IT IS NOT SO IMPORTANT TO ME 4. IT IS NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL TO ME 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q26. HOW DID YOU FIND OUT THE THINGS YOU KNOW ABOUT VENEREAL DISEAS?  1. OTHER PEOPLE WHO HAD A VENEREAL DISEASE TOLD ME ABOUT IT 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0146.Q26. HOW DID YOU FIND OUT THE THINGS YOU KNOW ABOUT VENEREAL DISEAS?  151 1. I READ ABOUT VENEREAL DISEASE IN NEWSPAPERS 419 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0146.Q26. HOW DID YOU FIND OUT THE THINGS YOU KNOW ABOUT VENEREAL DISEAS?  311 1. I READ ABOUT VENEREAL DISEASE IN BOOKS AND MAGAZINES 259 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0146.Q26. HOW DID YOU FIND OUT THE THINGS YOU KNOW ABOUT VENEREAL DISEAS?  413 1. I HEARD LECTURES ABOUT VENEREAL DISEASE 157 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0146.Q26. HOW DID YOU FIND OUT THE THINGS YOU KNOW ABOUT VENEREAL DISEAS?  211 1. I TALKED TO DOCTORS ABOUT VENEREAL DISEASE 359 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0146.Q26. HOW DID YOU FIND OUT THE THINGS YOU KNOW ABOUT VENEREAL DISEAS?  425 1. I SAW FILMS ABOUT VENEREAL DISEASE 145 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0146.Q26. HOW DID YOU FIND OUT THE THINGS YOU KNOW ABOUT VENEREAL DISEAS?  92 1. I HAD A VENEREAL DISEASE 478 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0146.Q26. HOW DID YOU FIND OUT THE THINGS YOU KNOW ABOUT VENEREAL DISEAS?  7 1. SOME OTHER SOURCE 563 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0146.Q26. HOW DID YOU FIND OUT THE THINGS YOU KNOW ABOUT VENEREAL DISEAS?  6 1. NO ANSWER 564 2. NOT CHOSEN

S0146.Q27. HAVE YOU EVER HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE BEING IN THE CHINA-BURMA-INDIA THEATE?  1. YES, I HAVE HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE BEING IN THE CBI 2. NO, I HAVE NOT HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE BEING IN THE CBI 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q28. ABOUT HOW OFTEN HAVE YOU HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE CHINA-BURMA-INDIA THEATE?  1. I HAVE HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SEVERAL TIMES A MONTH, OR MORE 2. ABOUT ONCE A MONTH 3. VERY RARELY 4. I HAVE NOT HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE BEING IN THE CBI 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q29. SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE CBI HAVE YOU BEEN GETTING SEXUAL INTERCOURSE MORE OFTEN, OR LESS OFTEN THAN YOU USED TO HAVE IT BACK HOM?  1. MORE OFTEN THAN BACK HOME 2. ABOUT THE SAME AS BACK HOME 3. LESS OFTEN THAN BACK HOME 4. I HAVE NOT HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE BEING IN THE CBI 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q30. WHEN YOU HAVE SEXUAL INTERCOURSE OVER HERE DO YOU USUALLY PAY CASH FOR I?  1. I ALWAYS PAY CASH FOR IT 2. I SOMETIMES PAY CASH, AND I SOMETIMES GET IT FREE 3. I NEVER PAY CASH 4. I HAVE NOT HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE BEING IN THE CBI 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q31. WHEN YOU HAVE SEXUAL INTERCOURSE OVER HERE DO YOU USE A CONDOM (RUBBER)*  1. I ALWAYS USE A CONDOM 2. I USUALLY USE A CONDOM 3. I USE A CONDOM ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. I SOMETIMES USE A CONDOM 5. I NEVER USE A CONDOM 6. I HAVE NOT HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE BEING IN THE CBI 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q32. WHEN YOU HAVE SEXUAL INTERCOURSE HOW OFTEN DO YOU GET A "PRO" (PROPHYLAXIS) AFTERWAR?  1. I NEVER GET A "PRO" 2. I SOMETIMES GET A "PRO" 3. I GET A "PRO" ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. I USUALLY GET A "PRO" 5. I ALWAYS GET A "PRO" 6. I HAVE NOT HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE BEING IN THE CBI 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q33. SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE CBI HOW MUCH BEER, WINE, OR LIQUOR HAVE YOU BEEN DRINKIN?  1. I AM DRINKING MORE THAN BACK HOME 2. I AM DRINKING ABOUT THE SAME AMOUNT AS BACK HOME 3. I AM DRINKING LESS THAN BACK HOME 4. I NEVER DRINK BEER, WINE, OR LIQUOR 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q34. WHEN YOU ARE AWAY FROM CAMP, AND HAVE A FEW DRINKS, DO YOU USUALLY END UP BY HAVING SEXUAL INTERCOURS?  1. I USUALLY HAVE SEXUAL INTERCOURSE AFTER I'VE BEEN DRINKING 2. I SOMETIMES HAVE SEXUAL INTERCOURSE AFTER I'VE BEEN DRINKING 3. I NEVER HAVE SEXUAL INTERCOURSE AFTER I'VE BEEN DRINKING 4. I NEVER DRINK BEER, WINE OR LIQUOR 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q35. REGARDLESS OF WHAT YOU HAVE DONE IN THE PAST, DO YOU THINK YOU WILL HAVE SEXUAL INTERCOURSE, IN THE FUTURE, WHILE YOU ARE IN CB?  1. YES, I PROBABLY WILL 2. I MIGHT, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I NEVER EXPECT TO HAVE INTERCOURSE WHILE IN THE CBI 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q36. DO YOU FEEL THAT THE LONGER YOU ARE IN THE CBI YOU BECOME MORE INTERESTED OR LESS INTERESTED, IN HAVING SEXUAL INTERCOURS?  1. I BECOME MORE INTERESTED THE LONGER I STAY HERE 2. MY INTEREST STAYS ABOUT THE SAME 3. I BECOME LESS INTERESTED THE LONGER I STAY HERE 4. I NEVER EXPECT TO HAVE SEXUAL INTERCOURSE WHILE IN THE CBI 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q37. WHICH ONE OF THE FOLLOWING IDEAS DO YOU THINK IS THE BEST WAY TO PREVENT THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT FROM GETTING VENEREAL DISEASE?  1. GIVE SEVERE PUNISHMENT IF A SOLDIER GETS A VENEREAL DISEASE 2. HAVE A FREE SUPPLY OF CONDOMS FOR THE MEN IN THE OUTFIT 3. GIVE MORE LECTURES ON SEX PROBLEMS 4. HAVE MORE RECREATIONAL FACILITIES 5. PUT "PRO" (PROPHYLAXIS) STATIONS WHERE THEY CAN BE REACHED EASILY 6. SOME OTHER IDEA 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q38. IF A MAN GETS A VENEREAL DISEASE AND THE RECORD SHOWS THAT HE DID NOT GET A "PRO" AFTER INTERCOURSE, DO YOU THINK HE SHOULD BE PUNISHE?  1. YES, HE SHOULD BE PUNISHED 2. NO, HE SHOULD NOT BE PUNISHED 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q39. THE ARMY SUPPLIES, UPON REQUEST, WHAT IS CALLED A "V-PACKETTE PROPHYLACTIC KIT", WHICH A SOLDIER CAN USE BY HIMSELF AFTER INTERCOURSE. DO YOU FEEL YOU HAVE HAD ENOUGH INSTRUCTION TO USE SUCH AN INDIVIDUAL "PRO" KIT YOURSEL?  1. YES, I KNOW HOW TO USE A V-PACKETTE "PRO" KIT 2. NO, I DON'T KNOW HOW TO USE A V-PACKETTE "PRO" KIT 3. I NEVER HEARD OF A V-PACKETTE "PRO" KIT 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q40A. HAVING A CASE OF GONORRHEA (CLAP) IS NO MORE SERIOUS THAN HAVING A BAD COL?  1. TRUE 2. FALSE 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q40B. THE ONLY WAY A PERSON CAN GET SYPHILIS OR GONORRHEA IS TO BE INFECTED WITH THE GERMS WHICH CAUSE THESE DISEASE?  1. TRUE 2. FALSE 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q40C. GONORRHEA (CLAP) IS FREQUENTLY CAUGHT FROM TOILET SEAT?  1. TRUE 2. FALSE 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q40D. THE WASSERMAN AND KAHN TESTS SHOW WHETHER A PERSON HAS GONORRHEA (CLAP)*  1. TRUE 2. FALSE 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q40. A PROPHYLAXIS ("PRO") TAKEN MORE THAN TWO HOURS AFTER SEXUAL INTERCOURSE IS OF LITTLE VALU?  1. TRUE 2. FALSE 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q40F. IF A WOMAN HAS A VENEREAL DISEASE SHE IS CERTAIN TO KNOW I?  1. TRUE 2. FALSE 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q40G. WEARING A CONDOM (RUBBER) DURING SEXUAL INTERCOURSE, AND GETTING A PROPHYLAXIS ("PRO") AFTERWARDS, WILL ALWAYS PREVENT ONE FROM GETTING A VENEREAL DISEAS?  1. TRUE 2. FALSE 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q41. HOW MUCH DO YOU WORRY ABOUT GETTING A VENEREAL DISEAS?  1. I WORRY ABOUT IT A LOT 2. I WORRY ABOUT IT SOMEWHAT 3. I DON'T WORRY ABOUT IT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q42A. ASSAM FOLLIES (HUMP HAPPY)*  1. SAW IT AND LIKED IT 2. SAW IT AND DIDN'T LIKE IT 3. DID NOT SEE THE SHOW 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q42B. JOE E. BROW?  1. SAW IT AND LIKED IT 2. SAW IT AND DIDN'T LIKE IT 3. DID NOT SEE THE SHOW 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q42C. SWING PATROL ORCHESTR?  1. SAW IT AND LIKED IT 2. SAW IT AND DIDN'T LIKE IT 3. DID NOT SEE THE SHOW 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q42D. PAULETTE GODDARD SHO?  1. SAW IT AND LIKED IT 2. SAW IT AND DIDN'T LIKE IT 3. DID NOT SEE THE SHOW 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q42E. HEY ROOKIE (YARD BIRDS)*  1. SAW IT AND LIKED IT 2. SAW IT AND DIDN'T LIKE IT 3. DID NOT SEE THE SHOW 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q43. OF THE ABOVE SHOWS THAT YOU SAW WHICH ONE DID YOU LIKE BES?  1. ASSAM FOLLIES (HUMP HAPPY) 2. JOE E. BROWN 3. SWING PATROL ORCHESTRA 4. PAULETTE GODDARD SHOW 5. HEY ROOKIE (YARD BIRDS) 6. I DIDN'T SEE ANY OF THE SHOWS 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q44. SOME PEOPLE HAVE SAID THAT SEVERAL OF THE SHOWS LISTED ABOVE HAD REMARKS THAT WERE DIRTY OR IMMORAL. DO YOU PERSONALLY THINK THAT ANY OF THESE SHOWS WERE TOO DIRT?  1. YES, ASSAM FOLLIES (HUMP HAPPY) 2. YES, JOE E. BROWN 3. YES, SWING PATROL ORCHESTRA 4. YES, PAULETTE GODDARD SHOW 5. YES, HEY ROOKIE (YARD BIRDS) 6. NO 7. I DIDN'T SEE ANY OF THE SHOWS 0. NO ANSWER P. THE RESEARCH UNIT HAS ALSO BEEN ASKED BY ARMY DOCTORS TO STUDY THE ATTITUDES OF SOLDIERS TOWARD THE PREVENTION OF MALARIA. THE IMPORTANCE OF CONTROLLING THIS DISEASE AS A FACTOR IN THE SUCCESSFUL PROSECUTION OF THE WAR IS NOT ALWAYS REALIZED. WE ARE MOST INTERESTED, THEREFORE, IN KNOWING WHAT YOU THINK ABOUT IT.
S0146.Q45. HOW MUCH DO YOU WORRY ABOUT GETTING MALARI?  1. I WORRY ABOUT IT A LOT 2. I WORRY ABOUT IT SOMEWHAT 3. I DON'T WORRY ABOUT IT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q46. REGARDLESS OF WHAT YOU HOPE, DO YOU THINK YOU WILL GET MALARIA SOMETIME BEFORE YOU LEAVE THE CHINA-BURMA-INDIA THEATE?  1. YES, I THINK I PROBABLY WILL GET MALARIA 2. NO, I THINK I PROBABLY WILL NOT GET MALARIA 3. I DON'T CARE ONE WAY OR THE OTHER 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q47. SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE CHINA-BURMA-INDIA THEATER, HOW MANY TALKS BY OFFICERS HAVE YOU HEARD ABOUT MALARIA AND MALARIA CONTRO?  1. NONE 2. ONE OR TWO TALKS 3. THREE OR FOUR TALKS 4. MORE THAN FOUR TALKS 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q48. SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN IN CHINA-BURMA-INDIA THEATER HAVE YOU SEEN ANY FILMS ABOUT MALARIA AND MALARIA CONTRO?  1. YES 2. NO 3. DON'T REMEMBER 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q49. HOW WOULD YOU RATE YOUR OWN GENERAL KNOWLEDGE ABOUT MALARIA AND MALARIA CONTRO?  1. I HAVE COMPLETE KNOWLEDGE OF THE SUBJECT 2. I HAVE A PRETTY FAIR KNOWLEDGE OF THE SUBJECT 3. I DON'T KNOW MUCH ABOUT THE SUBJECT 4. I DON'T KNOW ANYTHING AT ALL ABOUT THE SUBJECT 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q50. HOW IMPORTANT IS IT TO YOU PERSONALLY TO KNOW AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE ABOUT MALARIA AND MALARIA CONTRO?  1. IT IS VERY IMPORTANT TO ME 2. IT IS PRETTY IMPORTANT TO ME 3. IT IS NOT SO IMPORTANT TO ME 4. IT IS NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL TO ME 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q51. HOW DID YOU FIND OUT THE THINGS YOU NOW KNOW ABOUT MALARI?  1. OTHER PEOPLE WHO HAD MALARIA TOLD ME ABOUT IT 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0146.Q51. HOW DID YOU FIND OUT THE THINGS YOU NOW KNOW ABOUT MALARI?  128 1. I READ ABOUT MALARIA IN THE NEWSPAPERS 442 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0146.Q51. HOW DID YOU FIND OUT THE THINGS YOU NOW KNOW ABOUT MALARI?  253 1. I READ ABOUT MALARIA IN BOOKS AND MAGAZINES 317 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0146.Q51. HOW DID YOU FIND OUT THE THINGS YOU NOW KNOW ABOUT MALARI?  426 1. I HEARD LECTURES ABOUT MALARIA 144 2. NOT CHOSEN

S0146.Q52. IF SOME OF THE MEN YOU KNOW DO NOT TAKE PROPER PRECAUTIONS AGAINST GETTING MALARIA, WHAT DO YOU THINK IS THE MAIN REASON FOR THI?  1. THEY DON'T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT WHAT TO DO 2. THEY THINK THEY MAY GET MALARIA ANYWAY 3. THEY DON'T REALLY CARE WHETHER THEY GET MALARIA OR NOT 4. IT IS JUST TOO MUCH BOTHER TO TAKE PRECAUTIONS 5. SOME OTHER REASON 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q53. ATABRINE IS A MEDICINE IN TABLET FORM WHICH IS GIVEN TO MEN IN AREAS WHERE THERE IS A LOT OF MALARIA. FROM WHAT YOU HAVE HEARD, DO YOU THINK THAT ATABRINE CAUSES ANY HARM OR INJURY TO THE MEN WHO TAKE I?  1. YES 2. NO 3. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q54. WHICH ONE OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR OWN IDEA OF HOW GOOD ATABRINE IS IN CONTROLLING MALARI?  1. TAKING ATABRINE IS A SURE WAY TO KEEP FROM GETTING MALARIA 2. TAKING ATABRINE WON'T KEEP YOU FROM GETTING MALARIA, BUT IT WILL KEEP YOU FROM FEELING SICK FOR A WHILE IF YOU HAVE MALARIA 3. ATABRINE IS NO HELP AT ALL IN CONTROLLING MALARIA 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q55. HOW OFTEN DO YOU USE MOSQUITO REPELLENT ON YOUR FACE, HANDS AND CLOTHES AFTER DAR?  1. EVERY NIGHT 2. MOST OF THE TIME 3. ABOUT HALF OF THE TIME 4. VERY SELDOM 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q56. WHY DON'T YOU USE MOSQUITO REPELLENT MORE OFTEN THAN YOU D?  1. I DO USE IT EVERY NIGHT 2. CARELESSNESS 3. NO NEED 4. NOT AVAILABLE 5. BURNS THE SKIN 6. OTHER CRITICISMS 7. ALL OTHER ANSWERS 8. DON'T GO OUT NIGHTS 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q57. IF YOU HAVE USED MOSQUITO REPELLENT, HOW LONG DO YOU FIND IT WILL KEEP MOSQUITOES AWA?  1. 1 HOUR 2. 3 HOURS 3. 4 HOURS 4. 6 HOURS 0. NO ANSWER
S0146.Q58. HOW OFTEN ARE YOUR BARRACKS SPRAYED TO KILL MOSQUITOE?  1. EVERY DAY 2. EVERY FEW DAYS 3. ONCE A WEEK 4. NEVER SPRAYED 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q59. IF YOUR SLEEPING QUARTERS ARE SPRAYED EVERY DAY WHAT TIME OF THE DAY IS IT USUALLY DON?  1. EARLY MORNING 2. MIDDLE OF THE DAY 3. LATE AFTERNOON 4. MY QUARTERS ARE NOT SPRAYED EVERY DAY 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q60. WOULD YOU SAY THAT THE SPRAYING IN YOUR QUARTERS IS CAREFULLY DONE OR POORLY DON?  1. SPRAYING IN MY QUARTERS IS CAREFULLY DONE 2. SPRAYING IN MY QUARTERS IS POORLY DONE 3. MY QUARTERS ARE NOT SPRAYED AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q61. ARE THE DOOR SCREENS AND WINDOW SCREENS IN YOUR SLEEPING QUARTERS IN GOOD REPAIR NO?  1. YES, THEY ARE IN GOOD REPAIR 2. NO, THEY ARE IN NEED OF FIXING 3. THERE ARE NO SCREENS WHERE I SLEEP 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q62. LAST TIME THE DOOR SCREENS OR WINDOW SCREENS IN YOUR SLEEPING QUARTERS NEEDED REPAIR HOW LONG WAS IT BEFORE THEY WERE FIXE?  1. THE SCREENS HAVE NEVER NEEDED REPAIRS 2. THERE ARE NO SCREENS WHERE I SLEEP 3. ONE WEEK 4. ONE MONTH 5. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q63. THE LAST TIME REPAIRS WERE NEEDED FOR DOORS, SCREENS OR WINDOW SCREENS IN YOUR SLEEPING QUARTERS, HOW DID THE MEN WHO LIVE THERE GET THEM FIXE?  1. WE REPORTED IT TO THE PROPER AUTHORITIES AND THEY HAD IT FIXED 2. WE DIDN'T REPORT IT FIGURING THAT IT WOULD BE REPAIRED ANYHOW 3. WE FIXED IT OURSELVES 4. THE SCREENS HAVE NEVER NEEDED REPAIRS 5. THERE ARE NO SCREENS WHERE I SLEEP 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q64. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR OWN IDEA OF HOW THE MOSQUITO BOMB SHOULD BE USE?  1. YOU LOOK FOR THE MOSQUITOES AND TRY TO GET THE SPRAY TO HIT THEM DIRECTLY 2. YOU SPRAY IT ALL AROUND THE HUT OR TENT VERY QUICKLY AND RE-CAP THE BOMB 3. YOU SET THE BOMB IN THE MIDDLE OF THE HUT OR TENT AND LEAVE THE CAP OFF 4. I DON'T KNOW WHAT A MOSQUITO BOMB IS 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q65. WHEN THE WEATHER GETS VERY HOT, DO YOU SOMETIMES FIND THAT YOU CAN ONLY SLEEP BY REMOVING THE MOSQUITO NETTIN?  1. YES, I HAVE TO REMOVE THE NETTING 2. NO, I DON'T HAVE TO REMOVE THE NETTING 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q66. ALONG WITH THE MOSQUITO NET, THE ARMY USUALLY ISSUES A HEAD NET. DO YOU PERSONALLY THINK IT WOULD BE A GOOD IDEA OR A POOR IDEA FOR THE ARMY TO ORDER THE MEN TO WEAR THEIR HEAD NETS WHILE ON NIGHT DUTY TO PROTECT THEIR FACES AGAINST INSECT BITE?  1. IT WOULD BE A GOOD IDEA 2. IT WOULD BE A POOR IDEA 3. UNDECIDED 4. HAVEN'T BEEN ISSUED A HEAD NET 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q67. HOW IMPORTANT DO YOU FEEL IT IS FOR YOU TO WEAR LEGGINGS OR MOSQUITO BOOTS, OR TO TUCK YOUR TROUSERS INTO YOUR SOCKS - TO PREVENT MOSQUITO BITE?  1. IT IS OF NO IMPORTANCE AT ALL 2. IT IS OF LITTLE IMPORTANCE TO ME 3. IT IS OF MEDIUM IMPORTANCE TO ME 4. IT IS OF GREAT IMPORTANCE TO ME 5. IT IS ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY TO ME 0. NO ANSWER

S0146.Q68. SUPPOSE A WEAK SICKLY MAN AND A STRONG HEALTHY MAN ARE BOTH BITTEN BY MOSQUITOES CARRYING MALARIA. WHICH MAN DO YOU THINK IS MORE LIKELY TO GET MALARI?  1.
